greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The exponent of the highest power of 2 dividing A339821(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
program: (PARI) A339822(n) = { my(s=0, p=2); while(n>0, p = nextprime(1+p); if(n%2, s += valuation((p-1),2)); n >>= 1); (s); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 18 2020
